snippet: Pinkel, the former Missouri football coach, will remain at the university as a fund-raiser and ambassador, earning nearly $1 million over a three-year contract.
abstract: Missouri University football coach Gary Pinkel, who was recently diagnosed with non-Hodgkin lymphoma, will remain at university as fund-raiser and ambassador; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pinkel, the former Missouri football coach, will remain at the university as a fund-raiser and ambassador, earning nearly $1 million over a three-year contract.

headline.main: Missouri Has Job for Gary Pinkel
